title: Dream A Little Dream Of Me
lyrics:
(C) Stars (B7)shining bright a(Ab7)bove (G7)you
(C) Night (B7)breezes seem to (A)whisper "I (A7)love you"
(Dm) Birds (F)singing in the (Fm)sycamore trees
(C)Dream a little (Ab7)dream of (G7)me
 
(C) Say (B7)nighty-night and (Ab7)kiss (G)me
(C) Just (B7)hold me tight and (A)tell me you'll (A7)miss me
(Dm) While (F)I'm alone and (Fm)blue as can be
(C)Dream a little (Ab7)dream (G7)of (C)me (E7)
 
(A) Stars (F#m)fading but (Bm7)I linger (E7)on dear
(A) Still (F#m)craving your (Bm7)kiss (E7)
(A) I'm (F#m)longing to (Bm7)linger till (E7)dawn dear
(A) Just saying (Ab7)this (G7)
 
(C) Sweet (B7)dreams till sunbeams (Ab7)find (G7)you
(C) Sweet (B7)dreams that leave all (A)worries be(A7)hind you
(Dm) But (F)in your dreams (Fm)whatever they be
(C) Dream a little (Ab7)dream (G7)of (C)me (E7)
 
(A) Stars (F#m)fading but (Bm7)I linger (E7)on dear
(A) Still (F#m)craving your (Bm7)kiss (E7)
(A) I'm (F#m)longing to (Bm7)linger till (E7)dawn dear
(A) Just saying (Ab7)this (G7)
 
(C) Sweet (B7)dreams till sunbeams (Ab7)find (G7)you
(C) Sweet (B7)dreams that leave all (A)worries far be(A7)hind you
(Dm) But (F)in your dreams (Fm)whatever they be
(C)Dream a little (Ab7)dream (G7)of (C)me [end]
